m_szDocTitle: Chinese Students Design Two Formula 1 Car Models Fitted with 3D-Printed Steering Wheels | Inside 3D Printing
m_szDocSumamry: Chinese Students Design Two Formula 1 Car Models Fitted with 3D-Printed Steering Wheels Published by Sandra Helsel , September 25, 2015 11:30 am (3Ders.org) — Students from the Hefei University of Technology in China unveiled its two new Formula 1 car models: the FSAE VI and the “Cloud Electric.” Both cars have been fitted with 3D-printed steering wheels, which have been designed to better fit the driver’s hand, making driving and steering a more comfortable experience. The racing cars were designed specifically for college races, for, as Wu Jiahu, the Cloud Electricity racing team captain, ex
